glsa.title: Perl Digest-Base module: Arbitrary code execution
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability has been found in the Digest-Base Perl module, allowing remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: Digest-Base is a set of Perl modules that calculate message digests

description.p: The vulnerability is caused due to the “Digest->new()” function not properly sanitising input before using it in an “eval()” call.

impact.p: The vulnerability might allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Digest-Base module users should upgrade to the latest version:
